import functools
import operator
dot_prod = functools.reduce(operator.add, [arr1[i] * arr2[i] for i in range(len(arr1))], 0)

    tmp = arr1[i] * arr2[i]
    dot_prod += tmp

dot_prod = np.sum([arr1[i] * arr2[i] for i in range(len(arr1))])

import numpy as np
from math import fsum
dot_prod = fsum([arr1[i] * arr2[i] for i in range(len(arr1))])

single_elements = [arr1[i] * arr2[i] for i in range(len(arr1))]

    dot_prod += i * next(it_arr2)

    dot_prod += arr1[i] * arr2[i]
    i += 1
